Kiba and Akamaru jump into the air and uses the Fang Passing Fang technique. The two then merge creating a giant [[Passing Fang]]. They then tunnel far into the ground creating a large, deep hole.

== Trivia ==
* The full name of this technique is {{translation|Beast Human Taijutsu Secret Art: Heaven Twin Fang|獣人体術奥義・天双牙|Jūjin Taijutsu Ōgi: Tensōga|lit meaning=Beast Human Body Technique Secret Art: Heaven Twin Fang}}.
